feed.title: Paperless-AI Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v1.4.0
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0

Fixed or added the following:

First Startup - AI-Requests and Fetching? https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/32 Assign title and correspondent in manual mode https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/36 Paperless-ai making continuouesly Openai requests ? https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/issues/31 Completely reworked the dashboard Added settings page Added new manual mode Defined a template for later use

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v1.4.6
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v1.4.5...v1.4.6

  • Added a tokinization service to precalculate token size and trim to fit for larger contexts.

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.0.0
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v1.4.6...v2.0.0

Major Update:

Addressing Fixes and new Features:

Fixes: #66 #61 #58 #55 #53 #45 #59 #52 #49 #31 #37 #52

Added:

  1. Big New Feature: Playground
  2. Try your prompts on your documents and see how they perform. In Playground no data will be updated in Paperless.
  3. Added Code and Markdown interpretation in Chat Mode.
  4. Chat Mode now works with Ollama
